#Text=5. Discussion and Conclusion
#Text=In this study , the effect of electricity production on sustainable economic growth and industrial production is analyzed .
#Text=In this context , BRICS countries are included in the scope of the review .
#Text=They are the countries with the highest increase in electricity production in the period of 2000 – 2018 .
#Text=In the analysis process of this study , three different models were established by using the VAR method .
#Text=For this purpose , annual data of these variables in the period of 1991 – 2018 are taken into consideration .
#Text=According to the results of the analysis , the increase in electricity production will contribute to the sustainable economic growth in the following period .
#Text=On the other hand , it is also identified that higher electricity production will have a positive effect on industrial production in the following period .
#Text=In summary , it is concluded that electricity production has a significant impact on both sustainable economic growth and industrial production for BRICS countries .
#Text=As can be seen from the results of this study , electricity generation is vital for both industrial production and sustainable economic growth .
#Text=Therefore , electricity production needs to be increased especially for BRICS countries .
#Text=The main reason for this is that they have the status of developing countries .
#Text=The most important objective for them is to reach the level of developed countries , since economic development , among other factors , can improve population health status .
#Text=Hence , electricity generation is thought to serve this purpose seriously .
#Text=Within this framework , it is thought that the most significant duty belongs to the governments in these countries .
#Text=For example , it would be appropriate to give the necessary incentives for the construction of the dam .
#Text=For this purpose , it is important to encourage investors with tax advantages , location orientation and financing .
#Text=By increasing the number of the dams , it can be possible to increase electricity production , which has a positive contribution to sustainable growth .
#Text=In addition to these issues , it is also important that these countries turn to alternative energy sources in order to increase electricity production .
#Text=For instance , renewable energy sources such as solar , wind and geothermal energy have gained importance especially in recent years .
#Text=These energy alternatives have an inexhaustible structure because they take their resources from nature .
#Text=On the other hand , these alternative energy sources have no negative impact on the environment .
#Text=Because of these issues , BRICS countries should turn to renewable energy investments .
#Text=For this purpose , it is important to provide financial support to investors , such as tax advantage and providing loans .
#Text=Thus , it will be possible to achieve sustainable electricity production and sustainable economic growth by using renewable energy sources .
#Text=It is also recommended that countries should give importance to electricity production .
#Text=Another important point is that a detailed plan should be designed by the authorities with the aim of using this electricity effectively .
#Text=This situation is essential especially for developing countries .
#Text=Because they aim to improve their economies in order to reach the status of a developed economy , they should mainly focus on electricity production and use it effectively .
#Text=In this study , BRICS countries are selected because they have the highest ratio in electricity production .
#Text=The most important limitation of this study is the scope because of the data availability problem .
#Text=However , in future studies , if all necessary data can be provided , different countries or country groups can be considered , such as G7 , E7 or European Union .
